data.persona: As the Gobbo kin's tender I have to say I've seen more poisoning attempts since the last election than in my whole life.
data.description:
You are in the Kings Bed Room.
The walls are tall and stone. They are coated with colorful tapestries showing the kings of years past. A large stone fireplace across from the bed that is large enough to keep the king warm even on the coldest nights. A double thick wooden door with a large lock on each side of the room.
There's a bed, a floor to ceiling mirror, a heavy blanket, a large stone fireplace, a door, and a tapestry here.
The mourner is here.

You are carrying a Potion, and wearing a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the mourners the antidote
data.mid_motivation: I need to stop my patrons from being poisoned
data.long_motivation: I wish to prevent future killings and must give the antidote to my patrons in advance

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get potion from goblin king's bar
